donate: Become A Community Sponsor - Donate Now
banner_text: Pro-Home, Inc. provides one-on-one and group counseling in person or by phone. Counseling services include pre-purchase, first time homebuyer, foreclosure/short sale, tenant/landlord, financial literacy and fair housing.
services_text: Pro-Home, Inc. provides one-on-one and group counseling in person or by phone. Counseling services include pre-purchase, first time homebuyer, foreclosure/short sale, tenant/landlord, financial literacy and fair housing.
classes_text: Pro-Home, Inc. offers various classes and workshops that include pre-purchase, first time homebuyer, financial literacy and fair housing. We also hold fundraising and organizational events from time-to-time.
news_text: Pro-Home, Inc. makes various community resource information available, both online and in our office, for residents of Southeastern Massachusetts that are in need of services not available through our organization.
counselor_text: Pro-Home, Inc. produces short videos that discuss single topic issues. New episodes are released monthly. If you have specific questions or issues that are not covered, please contact our office for more assistance.
sponsors_title: Special Thanks To Our Community Sponsorships!
sponsors_subtitle: Please consider sponsoring Pro-Home, Inc. by making a tax deductible contribution today.
first_class_title: First Time Homebuyer Seminar (2 night workshop)

footer_bottom_text:
PRO-HOME, INC. IS A 501(c)(3) NON-PROFIT CORPORATION FOR THE PRODUCTION & PROTECTION OF AFFORDABLE HOUSING.
WE ARE ADA ACCESSIBLE AND PROVIDE INTERPRETERS TO THOSE WHO ARE DEAF, HARD OF HEARING OR ONLY SPEAK A FOREIGN LANGUAGE.
